text:
Kiriko,
It's already late, how about calling it a day?

Ah... It's already this late...
I'm sorry...!

No, I'm the one who should apologize.
You seemed so focused, I got carried away.

Yes... um...
about the Gothic concept...

Lately... everyone's been...
discussing ideas... about what to do...

I see...
Everyone's been working so hard.

Yes... that's why I want to...
contribute even a little...

Being able to work hard together with everyone...
makes me happy...

Your kindness, Kiriko, surely contributes to everyone's
strength. Of course, to your own strength as well.

I...
have so many things I want to try...

I hope I can become...
someone who can do them...

Ah, feel free to tell me anything!
I'll be there to help you with anything you need.
